meanings.sent1: The garden is full of beautiful clematises.
meanings.sent2: I planted some clematises in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The clematises in the garden seem to be having a party with the bees.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a clematises in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple clematises added a pop of color to the fence.

meanings.sent1: She bought three clematises for her garden.
meanings.sent2: The clematises in the park are so pretty.
meanings.sent3: The clematises on the trellis whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The clematises in the garden danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Clusters of clematises adorned the garden with their delicate petals.
